This study also reconfirm increased improvement next-day reduction spasticity follow overnight sublingual tizanidine dose accompany concomitant increase next-day somnolence . This study , 12 month open label extension , allow patient successfully complete Protocol C2/5/TZ-MS-05 find tizanidine beneficial , continue treatment close medical supervision .
